subject: Relationships
title: Matchmakers: The Original Dating Algorithm
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Matchmakers: The Original Dating Algorithm.

hook.text: Before Tinder, there were matchmakers. Jewish 'shadchans' have been pairing couples for over 2,000 years.

buildup.text: Professional matchmakers evaluate compatibility using family background, values, temperament, and life goals.

discovery.text: Modern matchmaking apps like Shaadi.com blend traditional criteria with technology â€” millions of successful matches.

twist.text: Matchmakers have a better success rate than dating apps. Humans still outperform algorithms at predicting compatibility.

climax.text: Whether human or algorithm, every matchmaker bets on the same truth: compatibility matters more than chemistry.

punchline.text: Matchmakers outperform dating apps. Humans still beat algorithms at love.
